Items.Title: Oversight - The Campaign for Fiscal Equity (CFE) Lawsuit, the Governor’s Failure to Comply and the Impact on New York City Schools.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Campaign for Fiscal Equity (CFE) Lawsuit, the Governor’s Failure to Comply and the Impact on New York City Schools.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon Governor George Pataki to immediately abide by the court order in the Campaign for Fiscal Equity lawsuit and fully fund New York City’s public schools, in consideration of the emergency facing our school system.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Abide by the court order in the Campaign for Fiscal Equity lawsuit.

Items.Title: Oversight - The Campaign for Fiscal Equity (CFE) Lawsuit, the Governor’s Failure to Comply and the Impact on New York City Schools.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Campaign for Fiscal Equity (CFE) Lawsuit, the Governor’s Failure to Comply and the Impact on New York City Schools.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon Governor George Pataki to immediately abide by the court order in the Campaign for Fiscal Equity lawsuit and fully fund New York City’s public schools, in consideration of the emergency facing our school system.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Abide by the court order in the Campaign for Fiscal Equity lawsuit.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Gallagher and Weprin
